1566405335_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: It's pretty cool there's OTA TV recievers for the Pi, but what do you use it for? Live sports not available as streams perhaps?

1568628122_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: If you want to open ports while running a VPN, that's usually done through your VPN providers website. It's easy if you need to connect to something, but a bit harder if you need something to connect to your local computer.
